results.title: Metformin and cancer-specific survival among breast, colorectal, or endometrial cancer patients: A nationwide data linkage study.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ and @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancer@@@-specific survival among @<m>DISEASE_Prostate_cancer_familial</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537243 @@@breast, colorectal, or endometrial cancer@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@: A nationwide data linkage study.

results.title: Metformin in selected malignancies in women.
results.text_hl: The effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Prostate_cancer_familial</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537243 @@@breast and endometrial cancer@@@ is favourable in the vast majority of studies.

results.title: Familial diabetes is associated with reduced risk of cancer in diabetic patients: a possible role for metformin.
results.text_hl: Additionally, @GENE_IGHD1_14 @GENE_28508 @@@DM2@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ without @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancer@@@, who had parents or siblings with @GENE_IGHD1_14 @GENE_28508 @@@DM2@@@, received @CHEMICAL_Biguanides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001645 @@@biguanide@@@ @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ versus @CHEMICAL_Sulfonylurea_Compounds @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013453 @@@sulfonylurea@@@ derivatives more often than those with @<m>DISEASE_Prostate_cancer_familial</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537243 @@@breast or endometrial cancer@@@, either with or without family history of @GENE_IGHD1_14 @GENE_28508 @@@DM2@@@.

results.title: Crosstalk between insulin/insulin-like growth factor-1 receptors and G protein-coupled receptor signaling systems: a novel target for the antidiabetic drug metformin in pancreatic cancer.
results.text_hl: Recent epidemiological studies linked administration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ with a reduced risk of @<m>DISEASE_Prostate_cancer_familial</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537243 @@@pancreatic, breast, and prostate cancer@@@ in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

results.title: The Effect of Metformin Use during Docetaxel Chemotherapy on Prostate Cancer Specific and Overall Survival of Diabetic Patients with Castration Resistant Prostate Cancer.
results.text_hl: Novel therapeutic options are needed for @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with metastatic castration resistant @DISEASE_Prostatic_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D011471 @@@prostate cancer@@@ and an approach is combining @CHEMICAL_Docetaxel @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077143 @@@docetaxel@@@ with chemosensitizing agents. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ has been shown to improve the survival of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Prostate_cancer_familial</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537243 @@@breast, lung and endometrial cancer@@@ receiving chemotherapy, and enhance chemotherapeutic efficacy in @DISEASE_Breast_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D001943 @@@breast cancer@@@ and @DISEASE_Colorectal_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D015179 @@@colon cancer@@@ cells.

citations.NLM: Mayer MJ, Klotz LH, Venkateswaran V. The Effect of Metformin Use during Docetaxel Chemotherapy on Prostate Cancer Specific and Overall Survival of Diabetic Patients with Castration Resistant Prostate Cancer. J Urol. 2017 Apr;197(4):1068-1075. PMID: 27984108

results.title: Cancer risk and PCOS.
results.text_hl: Recent data suggest that the use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may be protective for both @<m>DISEASE_Prostate_cancer_familial</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537243 @@@endometrial and breast cancer@@@.
